name: chatgpt-desktop
description: An electron-based multi-platform desktop application for interacting with OpenAI (Supports davinci and dall.e models).

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run client" "NODE_ENV=development npm run server" "NODE_ENV=development npm run electron"
scripts.prod: concurrently "NODE_ENV=development npm run server" "NODE_ENV=production cd desktop && npm run start-prod"
